benchmark_details.name: OmniEvalKit
benchmark_details.overview: OmniEvalKit is a novel benchmarking toolbox designed to evaluate large language models (LLMs) and their omni-extensions across multilingual, multidomain, and multimodal capabilities.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive and modular evaluation of LLMs and their extensions across various tasks, domains, and modalities.

data.source: Various evaluation datasets and model inputs integrated into the OmniEvalKit framework.
data.annotation: Automated extraction and evaluation facilitation with customizable metrics.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on model outputs compared to ground truth using various evaluation facilities.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance in generating accurate and relevant outputs.
methodology.validation: The framework validates models through a structured evaluation pipeline involving multiple components.
